data.title: Dollar (USD) to Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO) Currency Converter
data.meta_description: Convert from Dollars to córdobas with our currency calculator. Current exchange rate for the Dollar (USD) against the Nicaraguan córdoba (NIO).
data.text:
Exchange rate in the last 30 days

The exchange rate for the Dollar has decreased -0,38% against the Nicaraguan córdoba in the last 30 days, falling from 36,81 to 36,67 córdobas per Dollar. Today, you will get fewer córdobas for an amount in Dollars than you would have just a month ago. 30 days ago.

About the Nicaraguan córdoba

The Nicaraguan córdoba (ISO code: NIO), is the currency of Nicaragua.

Using this currency converter, you can find the latest exchange rate for the Nicaraguan córdoba and a calculator to convert from córdobas to Dollars. You can use this calculator offline while travelling in Nicaragua.
